snippet.title: SONIC AT THE OLYMPIC GAMES - TOKYO 2020 | Sept 2019 Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming worldwide in Spring, 2020!

"SONIC AT THE OLYMPIC GAMES - TOKYO 2020 ?" is an Olympic Mobile Game where the characters of the Sonic series appear. Countless popular Olympic sports games will be included, including the newly approved sports in the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games.
The game will progress through stages placed in popular tourist spots within Tokyo.
In addition to competing for rank with friends,there are many features for personal ranking for each event as well as online competitive play between countries and regions!



- Sports Action
- Android/iOS
- Planned for Spring 2020
- Download, as well as certain portions are free/ To play all features, certain payment will be required.
- SEGA Holdings Co., Ltd.

Official Website: http://www.olympicvideogames.com/sonic/jp/

Displayed company and product names are registered trademarks of their respepctive companies.
